Title: Establishes a community housing fund in the town of Rochester, county of Ulster
Summary: Establishes a community housing fund in the town of Rochester, county of Ulster, to provide housing opportunities for its residents.
LawCode: Add §64-l, Town L; add Art 31-J §§1449-aaaaaaaa - 1449-pppppppp, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the town law and the tax law, in relation to authorizing the town of Rochester to establish community housing funds to be funded by a supplemental real estate transfer tax
